scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run typings && webpack
scripts.test: npm run build && webpack --config webpack.tests.config.js && karma start --single-run
scripts.test-watch-chrome: npm run build && start webpack --watch --config webpack.tests.config.js && karma start --browsers Chrome
scripts.test-require: npm run build && npm install -g . && npm ls -g && cd test && node test-require.js && cd .. && npm remove -g .
scripts.publish-patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish-minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish
